00096 #include "LRU_List.h"
00097 #include "log_functions.h"
00098 #include "HashData.h"
00099 #include "HashTable.h"

00101 #include "cache_inode.h"
00102 #include "cache_content.h"

00104 #include <unistd.h>

00107 #include <time.h>

00110 
00111 cache_content_status_t cache_content_truncate( cache_content_entry_t      * pentry,
00112                                                fsal_size_t                  length,  
00113                                                cache_content_client_t     * pclient,
00114                                                cache_content_status_t     * pstatus ) 
00115 {
00116   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00117 
00118   /* Perform the truncate operation */
00119   if( truncate( pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, (off_t)length ) != 0 )
00120     {
00121       /* Operation failed */
00122 
00123       /* LOG */
00124       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00125                          "cache_content_truncate: impossible to truncate %s on local fs, error = ( %d, '%s' )",
00126                          pentry->local_fs_entry.cache_path_data, errno, strerror( errno ) ) ;
00127       
00128       /* Sets the error */
00129       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR ;
00130     }
00131   
00132   return *pstatus ;
00133 } /* cache_content_truncate */
